summary: Build vendor functionality: add vendor listing/management in the frontend and implement vendor registration in the backend with mandatory GST number and OTP verification for mobile number.

existing_features.title: Add frontend Vendors section that lets users view a list of registered vendors and access a vendor registration flow.

Create a frontend vendor registration UI with a two-step OTP verification flow: (1) enter vendor details including mandatory GST number and mobile, request OTP; (2) enter OTP to verify; and only then allow registration submission.

Add React Query hooks and backend bindings needed to support vendor listing, OTP request/verify, and vendor registration, following existing query/mutation patterns used for packages/designers/orders.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add vendor features in frontend (vendors section/listing/management UI).
Require OTP verification for vendor mobile number during registration.
Make GST number mandatory for vendor registration.
